mapper.select: SELECT sm.site_name siteHostName,sm2.site_name siteGuestName,js.job_success_count,js.job_failed_count,sm.institutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm,t_federated_site_manager sm2 where js.site_guest_id in (select id from t_federated_site_manager where institutions =#{institutions} and status = 2) and js.job_finish_date between #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and #{dateToday,jdbcType=DATE} and sm.id=js.site_host_id and sm2.id=js.site_guest_id

SELECT institutions,sum(job_success_count) successJobCountForInstitutions,sum(job_failed_count) failedJobCountForInstitutions FROM t_job_statistics js,t_federated_site_manager sm where js.site_guest_id =sm.id group by institutions
